sys_openapi_operation.name: Q&A
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Q&A","fOperationId":"qa","fDescription":"Will answer a question about text given in a prompt. This interface is deprecated and will be removed in a later version. New methodologies for processing Q&A tasks will be provided before this is removed.
","fPath":"/qa","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":true,"fRequest":{"fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"body_0209711742","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/QARequest","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"OK","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"output2570003139","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/QAResponse","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"nice","fDescription":"Setting this to True, will signal to the API that you intend to be nice to other users
by de-prioritizing your request below concurrent ones.
","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"nice6101901878","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"}}]}]}
